explanation: [0-0] In a pure white environment, Shaun is holding two playing cards, with a house of cards built on a haystack in front of it. On the right side of the frame are three haystacks stacked together.

[0-9] Shaun is about to place the cards in his hand onto the house of cards when a hand holding a red, white, and blue party horn slowly emerges from behind the haystacks in the background. The party horn blows, startling Shaun, who looks behind him. As he turns back to face his house of cards, it completely collapses. His face shows shock, staring in disappointment at the mess.

[9-18] The scene changes with a cut. Now, Shaun and Bitzer are on a bright green golf course with a bush in the background. Shaun is holding the flagpole stuck in the hole. [18-25] With another cut, the scene changes again. Now, Bitzer, wearing a black beret, is standing in front of an easel, painting a picture of a white skull on a blue canvas. There are two green bushes in the background. A red balloon tied with string emerges from the bush on the left. A hand pops the balloon with a needle, making a loud noise.
